title: Enhancing Clinical Practice Competencies: Blended Science Project-Based Learning for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners collaborate on blended (online/offline) projects to solve practical problems in scientific fields.
Learners produce project outcomes using digital tools under a constrained technological environment (smartphone-centric).
Learners apply scientific knowledge acquired through the PBL process to their professional domains (medical/legal/technical).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
